title: How to transfer my ticket to "billing support"
body:
*Read Title*

I received an email saying to transfer my current ticket to Billing Support, how would i do that?

replies.body: The process is done automatically. The response you received is just to tell you that the ticket is being transferred and it will take a little longer for you to get your next response.
Oh righto, they forgot to mention that it was automatic -.-
